import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Card, Row, Col, Container, Form, Button, Breadcrumb } from 'react-bootstrap'; import student from '../assets/student.png'; import teacher from '../assets/professor.png'; import parent from '../assets/family.png'; import schedule from '../assets/calendar.png'; import './Profile.css'; export default class Profile extends Component { render() { return (
18 STUDENTS 18 TEACHERS 18 PARENTS 18 SCHEDULES
) } }
